Title: Of Mice and Men
Writer: David E. Kelley, Jonathan Shapiro, David E. Kelley (created by), Jonathan Shapiro (created by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, William Hurt, Maria Bello, Olivia Thirlby
Plot: A burned-out attorney gets a second chance for redemption when he agrees to pursue a wrongful death lawsuit against the biggest client of his former law firm.
